donation_is_a_way:
A donation is a way to actively contribute to the success of leagues by increasing the prize pool.
You can make a donation at any point of the league.
tokens_are_invested: Your tokens are invested to generate interest, with the interest added to the prize pool.
full_donation_lock_value:
**Full donation**:
The amount will be given to the league to increase the total reward and you will not get it back.

**Lock value**:
The initial amount will be fully returned to you once the league ends.
type_amount: Type the amount you want to donate in the currency you prefer.
type_amount_angel: Type the amount you want to donate in {{currency}}.
type_message: Type a message to wish the participants good luck.
may_the_best: Hi there, may the best win!
balance_breakdown:
Congratulations!
Here is your balance breakdown for taking part in this league
full_donations_description: Users that donated an amount to the league as a gift, without the possibility to get it back
lock_values_description: Users that locked an amount in the league as a loan to donate the staking revenues
booster_description:
Buy one or more boosters to increase your score throughout the league duration
and get ahead of other participants.
Each booster costs 1 USDT and boosts the score of each transaction in this league by 10%.
Remember, boosters are stackable, so the more you buy, the better your chances of climbing the leaderboard!
booster_example: For example, if you buy 3 boosters and make a transaction worth 10 points, thanks to the multiplier, it will be worth 30 points.
booster_left: You can purchase up to {{n}} more boosters for this league
booster_terminated: You have reached the maximum number of boosters you can purchase for this league
